name: Epic Battle Royale Simulator
description:
+13 EPIC GAMEMODES with ADJUSTABLE GAME DIFFICULTY!
Battle Royale, Battle Arena, DM, TDM, Zombies, Tank Battle, Attack & Defend, Maze, Dropout, Paratroopers Attack, Snipers and many more...

+25 AMAZING MAPS!

— CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION!
Name, Skin Colors, Shirts Selection, Pants Selection, Shoes Selection

— INVENTORY, BACKPACK, EQUIPMENT, CRAFTING, BUILDING, STATISTICS!

— FUNNY & REALISTIC RAGDOLL!

— EXTRAS & SPECIAL ABILITIES!
Call Support, Heal, Spawn Players, Fly Mode, Super Speed Mode, Super Jump Mode and many more

— UPGRADES!
Health, Stamina, Health Regen Speed, Jump Force, Run Speed

— VEHICLES!
 Tanks, Armored Vehicles, Cars

 — HELMETS!
Spartan, Barbute, Assault, Bust, Biker, War Helmet 

— WEAPONS & GUNS!
 Pistol, Revolver, AKM, GKM, Rifle, Heavy Machinegun, Sniper, Bazooka, Flamethrower, Various types of Ammo

— CONSUMABLES!
Medkits, Adrenaline, Pills, Bandage, First Aid Kit, Drinks, Food

— BUILDING TOOLS!
Hammer, Plank, Scrap

— GAME ZONE, AIR DROPS, TURRETS!
